information: the company e.c.m. refrattari started out in business in 1959 and since 1980, has concentrated exclusively on grinding and producing non-formed materials. thanks to the quality testing carried out in its own laboratory, the company has achieved iso 9002 certification. this laboratory is also equipped for particle size verification and setting times, so we regularly conduct these checks to guarantee constant quality to our customers. our main products are dry cement, refractory castings and granulates. thanks to its innovative and flexible production plants, e.c.m. can manufacture refractory materials for the steel industry, building and heating, all of a high quality and adaptable to customers' specific requirements. its refractory products are made using inerts which are ideal for a wide range of uses in the building industry and for heating.

products_and_services: tile and tile floors, porcelain | porcelain tiles | ceramic tiles for floors | bathroom tiles | ceramic interior wall-coverings for industrial buildings
information: ceramiche san nicola s.r.l. is a family owned company based in south italy and manufacturing porcelain tiles. our products range from small formats to large ones, for indoor and outdoor flooring and wall covering. our new factory was opened in 2004 and in 2014 we have completely renovated our production line, acquiring the most advanced digital technology machinery allowing us to achieve, together with stringent quality controls, very high quality levels in terms of beauty, accuracy and durability. our whole production process is made in italy. as manufacturers, we are confident of offering high quality products to our customers at affordable prices, making our tiles a top choice in terms of value-for-money. after over 30 years of family experience in the field and after manufacturing porcelain tiles for over ten years for some important big names in the market and distributing our products in the domestic market, our company is now looking for distributors and possible partnerships in order to expand the presence of its brand on international markets. we are investing to improve brand awareness and planning a complete renovation of our website in order to improve usability and make product search easier. it will be soon available also in english. our company already achieved iso: 9000 certification a few years ago. we recently started the iso: 14000 certification process which will be completed later this year.

information: our company was established in 2010 but we are present on the market since 1983. all of our products are handmade using the highest quality materials to ensure life-lasting durability indoor and outdoor. beauty and perfection are sensory reminders that live only in the eyes of the beholder, which is why in mavi ceramica we exclusively make handmade products where the hand of man takes them away from the standardization of the machine in which irregularities and imperfections are the sign and guarantee of a unique product. we are convinced that the made in italy makes the difference therefore we are constantly pursuing that mission, without losing our craftsmanship that makes our products unique. our style center is constantly evolving through the research and development of new designs. we are improving our services to provide total customer satisfaction.

products_and_services: earthenware tiles | earthenware tiles and bricks | tiles customizable in shape size colors and finishing | handmade tiles for flooring and ceiling | handmade bricks for roof and masonry
information: ~about 2500 years ago filosopher empedocle from agrigento affirmed that the universe is created from four elements: earth, water, wind and fire. probably these elements are not the foundation of the universe, but certainly they are the foundation of our earthenware tiles and bricks. we are stefano and petronio stefani, company owners’ since the end of the ’70s and successors of a family tradition which goes back to the sixteenth century. since then we produce handmade tiles and bricks using a mixture of rainwater and clay from our mine
min_headcount: no other material is added. the moulding is totally hand-made, inserting and pressing the wet clay in wooden plates. the following procedures, the key to the creation of an excellent product, are also handmade, according to an ancient technique which dates back to etrurians. the firing process in a centuries-old wood kiln takes several days. in this way, the tiles and bricks obtained are aesthetically exquisite and everlasting, and can be fully considered organic products, suitable for green building. moreover, they are excellent natural acoustic and thermal insulation material. in our 40 years of experience we did not only join the restoration of old rural houses and old town centres or manufacture high quality residential buildings, but our cotto also had the privilege to contribute to the restoration of a lot of monuments of worldwide importance.~

information: studio 1 automazioni industriali s.r.l. designs and manufactures automatic machines and complete plants for the industry. the ceramic industry was the first sector to which studio 1 automazioni industriali s.r.l. dedicated its maximum efforts receiving its first professional recognition. studio 1 automazioni industriali s.r.l. received such recognition not only from sassuolo ceramic district but also throughout the rest of the world where ceramic has constantly gown creating large industry concentrations. it is well known that ceramic industry is a ‘young industry’ and for this very reason effervescent and dynamic , in fact in a few years this industry has grown from a production cycle full of manual steps to one of the most automated production cycles . studio 1 automazioni industriali s.r.l is proud to be part of this automatization process which as made the italian ceramic plants leader in the world market .

products_and_services: crushing and grinding machinery | rotary dryers | air classifying systems | dry mortars for building industry | machines and equipment for mixing
information: cimma ing. morandotti & c. srl is operating in the design and construction of machines and plants for processing powders, in particular grinding and pulverizing, machines, screening machines, air classifiers, dryers, dedusting filters, pneumatic transports and mixers. with the experience and the know-how acquired along the years, cimma designs and supplies machines and complete industrial units in many fields such as production of dry mortars and plaster, processing of lime and limestone, fine grinding of minerals, preparation of raw materials for the ceramic industry, chemical industry, pulverizing of solid fuels, feed and food cimma manufactures a wide range of machines such as grinding mills, pulverizing systems, air classifiers, rotary dryers, paddle mixers, dosing systems and accessories for pneumatic transport.according to customers' requirements and thanks to its large know how, cimma ing. morandotti & c. srl supplies different solutions for complete production lines.

address: via sant'antonio maria zaccaria, 1 | 20100 milano - italy
products_and_services: chemicals - basic products & derivatives | chemical additives | cmc (carboxymethylcellulose) | adjuvants for water treatment | chemicals for the textile industry | industrial chemical products | glues for paper manufacturing | adhesives | aluminium salts | chemical products
information: mare has its roots in the production and supply of basic products to the paper and board industry, as well as detergents, ceramics, concrete, flame retardants and other specialist industries. mare takes pride in being a supplier than understands its customers' processes, with the backing of technical experts from various sectors, primarily that of paper, to enhance and optimise their processes.

products_and_services: tile and tile floors, porcelain | porcelain tiles | ceramic tiles for floors | bathroom tiles | ceramic interior wall-coverings for industrial buildings
information: ceramiche san nicola s.r.l. is a family owned company based in south italy and manufacturing porcelain tiles. our products range from small formats to large ones, for indoor and outdoor flooring and wall covering. our new factory was opened in 2004 and in 2014 we have completely renovated our production line, acquiring the most advanced digital technology machinery allowing us to achieve, together with stringent quality controls, very high quality levels in terms of beauty, accuracy and durability. our whole production process is made in italy. as manufacturers, we are confident of offering high quality products to our customers at affordable prices, making our tiles a top choice in terms of value-for-money. after over 30 years of family experience in the field and after manufacturing porcelain tiles for over ten years for some important big names in the market and distributing our products in the domestic market, our company is now looking for distributors and possible partnerships in order to expand the presence of its brand on international markets. we are investing to improve brand awareness and planning a complete renovation of our website in order to improve usability and make product search easier. it will be soon available also in english. our company already achieved iso: 9000 certification a few years ago. we recently started the iso: 14000 certification process which will be completed later this year.

products_and_services: automation - systems and equipment | tile-making - machinery and equipment | enamelling machinery | machines and equipment for the ceramics industry | advice for the ceramic industry
information: airless italia is a company specialized in the design and manufacturing of machines for glazing ceramic tiles. these machines provide performance which meet the highest production standards. we have been researching and developing technological advancements and innovations for over 20 years. our vast experience in product development allows us to work with our clients to customize our machines to their specific needs, allowing us to create efficient and reliable solutions. airless vision consists of offering technological innovations always on the cutting edge and capable of anticipating market trends.

information: lima is a company that produces and trades industrial gaskets and technical items made of thermoplastic and elastomeric materials as well as high performance technopolymers, whatever type they may be. the company doesn't only manufacture standard products but also uses high precision cnc machines to produce plastic parts made to design (including ptfe, pom, pa, pe, pvc, peek, pp, pctfe and rubber). lima uses special thermoplastic materials - required above all for critical applications and in certain sectors - such as abs, fep, pfa, pps, pbt, psu, pai and pei. lima handles both virgin and processed materials: some of the most highly requested and used compounds are bronze, glass, ceramic, carbon graphite, carbon, talc, stainless steel, molybdenum sulfide, graphite, calcium fluoride, mineral salts, mica, glass fibre, carbon fibre and polyester resin.

products_and_services: diamond tools | diamond discs for granite | diamond disks | diamond discs for marble
information: founded in 1960, la nord s.r.l. is an italian company manufacturing diamond discs and segments suited for cutting ceramic tiles, marble, granite and large blocks of stone. emerging in one of the most important italian granite industrial areas (val d’ossola), we are specialized in cutting granite and other stone materials. thanks to a great deal of experience and demand from italian and foreign markets our products are extraordinary suitable for other materials such as cement, asphalt, ceramic porcelain stoneware, and refractory parts. persistent ongoing research and innovation leads la nord to process other products (combined materials) suitable for the new market.missionfinding the right mix between the cutting system and the durability of the tools for each type of materials and machines used. our experience helps us to say that nothing is impossible. partnership local and professional support for our customers to ensure continuous product improvement. we first meet our customers and then develop the right solution for their needs. ”each quote is worthy of consideration” osa marking diamond discs and the flexible-tooling products are international organisation for the safety of abrasives (osa) marked. osa markings grants assurance to the consumers of la nord the usage of the best quality in iso certification standards and en safety rules. made in italy thanks to more than 50 years of experience, diamond segments are fully pre-printed, sintered and welded in italy.

information: manufacturer of industrial gaskets and technical supplies. spiral wound, ring joint, special metal rings, taylor made products, kammprofile gaskets, jacketed gaskets, non asbestos packing, asbestos free gaskets, flat gaskets, flange insulation kit, compounds, ptfe, graphite, reinforged graphite, o-rings, rubber, ceramic, etc. metal gaskets are manufactured in soft iron, low alloy steel, monel, stainless steel and alloy steel grades and others materials in accordance to customer's needs. most poplular stainless steel grades include ss304, ss316, ss321 etc.. alloy steel grades include inconel, hastelloy , duplex steel , super duplex steel, 254 smo etc. low alloy steel incude f5, f5a, f9, f11, f22 etc. reference markets are: chemical, petrochemical & pharmaceutical industry, refinery, on shore & off shore plants, lng plants, water treatment plants, etc.

products_and_services: tile-making - machinery and equipment | ceramic manufacturing - machinery and equipment | brick-making - machinery and equipment | enamelling machinery | crushing equipment | tile coolers | spraygun booths | ceramic decoration machinery | airless cabins | disc spraying booths
information: officine smac produces enamelling, ceramic and tile decorating lines and machinery, silkscreen printing machinery for decorations and enamelling and roof tile and brick engobing, crushing machinery and plants and selection of ceramics, sintered glazes, glass, crystal, granules and enamels, roller printing machinery. since 1969, officine smac s.p.a. has specialized in the construction of automatic controls, systems and equipment for the ceramics and brick industry.

company_name: diamond blade diamond tools diamond segment
products_and_services: diamond tools | diamond discs for granite | diamond disks | diamond discs for marble
information: founded in 1960, la nord s.r.l. is an italian company manufacturing diamond discs and segments suited for cutting ceramic tiles, marble, granite and large blocks of stone. emerging in one of the most important italian granite industrial areas (val d’ossola), we are specialized in cutting granite and other stone materials. thanks to a great deal of experience and demand from italian and foreign markets our products are extraordinary suitable for other materials such as cement, asphalt, ceramic porcelain stoneware, and refractory parts. persistent ongoing research and innovation leads la nord to process other products (combined materials) suitable for the new market.missionfinding the right mix between the cutting system and the durability of the tools for each type of materials and machines used. our experience helps us to say that nothing is impossible. partnership local and professional support for our customers to ensure continuous product improvement. we first meet our customers and then develop the right solution for their needs. ”each quote is worthy of consideration” osa marking diamond discs and the flexible-tooling products are international organisation for the safety of abrasives (osa) marked. osa markings grants assurance to the consumers of la nord the usage of the best quality in iso certification standards and en safety rules. made in italy thanks to more than 50 years of experience, diamond segments are fully pre-printed, sintered and welded in italy.

products_and_services: automation - systems and equipment | tile-making - machinery and equipment | enamelling machinery | machines and equipment for the ceramics industry | advice for the ceramic industry
information: airless italia is a company specialized in the design and manufacturing of machines for glazing ceramic tiles. these machines provide performance which meet the highest production standards. we have been researching and developing technological advancements and innovations for over 20 years. our vast experience in product development allows us to work with our clients to customize our machines to their specific needs, allowing us to create efficient and reliable solutions. airless vision consists of offering technological innovations always on the cutting edge and capable of anticipating market trends.

products_and_services: mortars and cements, refractory | refractory materials and products | refractory materials | refractory materials for construction work | refractory concrete | reflective coverings | plasterboard insulating materials | building roofing insulation | soundproofing for buildings | roofing materials
information: the company e.c.m. refrattari started out in business in 1959 and since 1980, has concentrated exclusively on grinding and producing non-formed materials. thanks to the quality testing carried out in its own laboratory, the company has achieved iso 9002 certification. this laboratory is also equipped for particle size verification and setting times, so we regularly conduct these checks to guarantee constant quality to our customers. our main products are dry cement, refractory castings and granulates. thanks to its innovative and flexible production plants, e.c.m. can manufacture refractory materials for the steel industry, building and heating, all of a high quality and adaptable to customers' specific requirements. its refractory products are made using inerts which are ideal for a wide range of uses in the building industry and for heating.

products_and_services: ornamental ceramics | artistic ceramics | sub-contract artistic ceramics | ceramic floor tiles | ceramics from vietri | artistic ceramic gifts and fancy goods | ceramics from vietri | ceramic | vietri ceramics | handcrafted ceramics
information: the brave art ceramica at vietri has focused on the made in italy craftsmanship. the tradition of the vietri ceramics, the skill of handmade work. the vietri ceramics meet new processes creating ceramic collections that have a high artistic content. brave art markets the vietri ceramics relying on craftsmen that are highly regarded worldwide. if you are interested in a customised project you can share your creative idea with our master decorator craftsmen.

company_name: ruggiero ceramica bomboniere e lista nozze
address: via magna grecia 525 | 84047 capaccio paestum - italy
products_and_services: ceramic, crockery | ornamental ceramics | artistic ceramic furniture accessories | artistic ceramics | wholesale artistic ceramics | artistic ceramic gifts and fancy goods | handcrafted ceramics | ceramic | ceramic floor tiles | gift items
information: ruggiero ceramica's ceramics entirely encompass paestum's history and artistic taste, and are also ideal as a gift. andrea ruggiero, is a very talented craftsman from the salerno province and he is specialised in party favours that are all handmade and hand painted. each piece is unique and authentic, an uncommon example of valuable craftsmanship. ruggiero ceramica doesn't only produce party favours, but also sculptures, vases, lucky charms, crockery, furnishing complements and gift items.

products_and_services: tile and tile floors, porcelain | porcelain tiles | ceramic tiles for floors | bathroom tiles | ceramic interior wall-coverings for industrial buildings
information: ceramiche san nicola s.r.l. is a family owned company based in south italy and manufacturing porcelain tiles. our products range from small formats to large ones, for indoor and outdoor flooring and wall covering. our new factory was opened in 2004 and in 2014 we have completely renovated our production line, acquiring the most advanced digital technology machinery allowing us to achieve, together with stringent quality controls, very high quality levels in terms of beauty, accuracy and durability. our whole production process is made in italy. as manufacturers, we are confident of offering high quality products to our customers at affordable prices, making our tiles a top choice in terms of value-for-money. after over 30 years of family experience in the field and after manufacturing porcelain tiles for over ten years for some important big names in the market and distributing our products in the domestic market, our company is now looking for distributors and possible partnerships in order to expand the presence of its brand on international markets. we are investing to improve brand awareness and planning a complete renovation of our website in order to improve usability and make product search easier. it will be soon available also in english. our company already achieved iso: 9000 certification a few years ago. we recently started the iso: 14000 certification process which will be completed later this year.

products_and_services: earthenware tiles | earthenware tiles and bricks | tiles customizable in shape size colors and finishing | handmade tiles for flooring and ceiling | handmade bricks for roof and masonry
information: ~about 2500 years ago filosopher empedocle from agrigento affirmed that the universe is created from four elements: earth, water, wind and fire. probably these elements are not the foundation of the universe, but certainly they are the foundation of our earthenware tiles and bricks. we are stefano and petronio stefani, company owners’ since the end of the ’70s and successors of a family tradition which goes back to the sixteenth century. since then we produce handmade tiles and bricks using a mixture of rainwater and clay from our mine
min_headcount: no other material is added. the moulding is totally hand-made, inserting and pressing the wet clay in wooden plates. the following procedures, the key to the creation of an excellent product, are also handmade, according to an ancient technique which dates back to etrurians. the firing process in a centuries-old wood kiln takes several days. in this way, the tiles and bricks obtained are aesthetically exquisite and everlasting, and can be fully considered organic products, suitable for green building. moreover, they are excellent natural acoustic and thermal insulation material. in our 40 years of experience we did not only join the restoration of old rural houses and old town centres or manufacture high quality residential buildings, but our cotto also had the privilege to contribute to the restoration of a lot of monuments of worldwide importance.~

products_and_services: marble | marble mosaics | marble tiles | mosaic tile | marble mosaic coverings
information: ideamarmo is based in valpolicella (verona-italy), the land of marble. we design and produce marble mosaics for floors, walls and coverings. our marble coverings can be used for bathrooms and kitchens, but also for outdoor spaces and swimming pools. we manufacture marble mosaics for private houses, but also for spas, hotels and wellness centers. we provide custom designed marble mosaics and we work with skilled architects, designers and artisans. we are in italy but we sell our product worldwide.

products_and_services: glass | decorative stones for gardens | photo luminescent pigments | garden lamps | landscape architecture
information: lucedentro is a company founded in 2006, based in sassuolo, italy. we deal with photo-luminescent applications and we have made of versatility one of our strengths. the peculiarity of photoluminescence is its capacity of automatically recharge itself with solar or artificial light, giving it back in the dark and glowing up to 9 hours. photoluminescent pigments can be applied on many different materials such as glass, wood, paper, plastic or metals. the pigments used by lucedentro are not perishable, are not toxic or radioactive. the presence of heavy metals is well below the limits prescribed by european and american standards for categories of products such as cosmetics and toys. we work with both european and global partners: one of our favorite project was for garden landscaping in ryoan-ji park in kyoto, japan we are a research and development company, always up to innovation and for latest solutions in our field. we particularly care about energy saving and respect for the environment. lucedentro crosses over many fields: design, security, building materials and energy savings. lucedentro offers solutions of technical and aesthetic quality, made in collaboration with designers, architects, artists who are able to express the full potential of the luminescence.

company_name: diamond blade diamond tools diamond segment
products_and_services: diamond tools | diamond discs for granite | diamond disks | diamond discs for marble
information: founded in 1960, la nord s.r.l. is an italian company manufacturing diamond discs and segments suited for cutting ceramic tiles, marble, granite and large blocks of stone. emerging in one of the most important italian granite industrial areas (val d’ossola), we are specialized in cutting granite and other stone materials. thanks to a great deal of experience and demand from italian and foreign markets our products are extraordinary suitable for other materials such as cement, asphalt, ceramic porcelain stoneware, and refractory parts. persistent ongoing research and innovation leads la nord to process other products (combined materials) suitable for the new market.missionfinding the right mix between the cutting system and the durability of the tools for each type of materials and machines used. our experience helps us to say that nothing is impossible. partnership local and professional support for our customers to ensure continuous product improvement. we first meet our customers and then develop the right solution for their needs. ”each quote is worthy of consideration” osa marking diamond discs and the flexible-tooling products are international organisation for the safety of abrasives (osa) marked. osa markings grants assurance to the consumers of la nord the usage of the best quality in iso certification standards and en safety rules. made in italy thanks to more than 50 years of experience, diamond segments are fully pre-printed, sintered and welded in italy.

company_name: diamond blade diamond tools diamond segment
products_and_services: diamond tools | diamond discs for granite | diamond disks | diamond discs for marble
information: founded in 1960, la nord s.r.l. is an italian company manufacturing diamond discs and segments suited for cutting ceramic tiles, marble, granite and large blocks of stone. emerging in one of the most important italian granite industrial areas (val d’ossola), we are specialized in cutting granite and other stone materials. thanks to a great deal of experience and demand from italian and foreign markets our products are extraordinary suitable for other materials such as cement, asphalt, ceramic porcelain stoneware, and refractory parts. persistent ongoing research and innovation leads la nord to process other products (combined materials) suitable for the new market.missionfinding the right mix between the cutting system and the durability of the tools for each type of materials and machines used. our experience helps us to say that nothing is impossible. partnership local and professional support for our customers to ensure continuous product improvement. we first meet our customers and then develop the right solution for their needs. ”each quote is worthy of consideration” osa marking diamond discs and the flexible-tooling products are international organisation for the safety of abrasives (osa) marked. osa markings grants assurance to the consumers of la nord the usage of the best quality in iso certification standards and en safety rules. made in italy thanks to more than 50 years of experience, diamond segments are fully pre-printed, sintered and welded in italy.

type_of_building_for_registered_address: production of additives. -design of the mold and related equipment
websites: -tests mold and molding of thermoplastic articles
download_datetime: -production in iso 7 clean room and gray room. t.s.t. offers high-tech customized products using 1-k / 2-k and 3-k molding techniques. the company is equipped with: -13 mono-injection presses from 25 to 250 tons, -10 bi-injection presses from 90 to 175 tons. -3 full eletrics presses from 28 to 130 tons. -4 assembly and testing lines. to ensure a quality product, t.s.t. is certified: uni en iso 9001: 2015, iatf 16949: 2016 and uni en iso 13485: 2016. it operates in the sectors: 1-automotive: seat belt assemblies, buckles and pretensioners, solar and fuel sensors, cooling pump components, control panel and door panel escutcheons and actuators, transmission and flow control components, others 2-medical: manufacture of components and groups for fluid filtration, boxes for hemodialysis and cardiac monitoring, components for cardiac surgery, valves and fluid control components, others 3-industrial: electronic parts, household appliances and household appliances, others.~

products_and_services: tile and tile floors, porcelain | porcelain tiles | ceramic tiles for floors | bathroom tiles | ceramic interior wall-coverings for industrial buildings
information: ceramiche san nicola s.r.l. is a family owned company based in south italy and manufacturing porcelain tiles. our products range from small formats to large ones, for indoor and outdoor flooring and wall covering. our new factory was opened in 2004 and in 2014 we have completely renovated our production line, acquiring the most advanced digital technology machinery allowing us to achieve, together with stringent quality controls, very high quality levels in terms of beauty, accuracy and durability. our whole production process is made in italy. as manufacturers, we are confident of offering high quality products to our customers at affordable prices, making our tiles a top choice in terms of value-for-money. after over 30 years of family experience in the field and after manufacturing porcelain tiles for over ten years for some important big names in the market and distributing our products in the domestic market, our company is now looking for distributors and possible partnerships in order to expand the presence of its brand on international markets. we are investing to improve brand awareness and planning a complete renovation of our website in order to improve usability and make product search easier. it will be soon available also in english. our company already achieved iso: 9000 certification a few years ago. we recently started the iso: 14000 certification process which will be completed later this year.

products_and_services: ceramics | stoneware tiles | ceramic tiles | bathroom tiles
information: this italian brand is proud to offer its 25 years of experience to the world markets. owing its design of colour and texture to renowned italian designers, primi ceramiche products are manufactured in dedicated factories in china, and exported to many final destinations around the world. bringing together quality, affordability and variety without compromise, primi ceramiche is also known for its highly reliable customer service that extends beyond the point of sale. you can always expect the best from primi ceramiche. currently operating from italy and china, we can offer our customers the best combination of innovative design and high quality. our 30 years of experience in producing and distributing ceramic and porcelain tiles throughout the world is the best guarantee of best service and supply.

company_name: diamond blade diamond tools diamond segment
products_and_services: diamond tools | diamond discs for granite | diamond disks | diamond discs for marble
information: founded in 1960, la nord s.r.l. is an italian company manufacturing diamond discs and segments suited for cutting ceramic tiles, marble, granite and large blocks of stone. emerging in one of the most important italian granite industrial areas (val d’ossola), we are specialized in cutting granite and other stone materials. thanks to a great deal of experience and demand from italian and foreign markets our products are extraordinary suitable for other materials such as cement, asphalt, ceramic porcelain stoneware, and refractory parts. persistent ongoing research and innovation leads la nord to process other products (combined materials) suitable for the new market.missionfinding the right mix between the cutting system and the durability of the tools for each type of materials and machines used. our experience helps us to say that nothing is impossible. partnership local and professional support for our customers to ensure continuous product improvement. we first meet our customers and then develop the right solution for their needs. ”each quote is worthy of consideration” osa marking diamond discs and the flexible-tooling products are international organisation for the safety of abrasives (osa) marked. osa markings grants assurance to the consumers of la nord the usage of the best quality in iso certification standards and en safety rules. made in italy thanks to more than 50 years of experience, diamond segments are fully pre-printed, sintered and welded in italy.

information: we are polo-epo organic tiles co manufacturing 100% handmade & ce marked tiles. our tiles are resistant to extremely high temperatures, frost resistant and anti-slip as per eu norms & regulations. it’s suitable for indoor and outdoor application. it is used in indoor floors, outdoor floors, under roofs, gardens, kitchens, swimming pool areas. apart from all below sizes we produce many special sizes which is not included our below list. we can produce any sizes as per buyer specification. we export 13 to 15 container’s in every month in italy, portugal and south korea market. tiles are available in a range of sizes and colours, and samples are available on request. 10 x 10 x 2.5 cm 15 x 15 x 2.5 cm 15 x 30 x 2.5 cm 17 x 17 x 2.0 cm 20 x 20 x 2.5 cm 21 x 21 x 2.0 cm 20 x 20 x 2.0 cm 25 x 50 x 3.0 cm 30 x 30 x 2.5 cm 30 x 60 x 3.0 cm

products_and_services: safety equipment, work | safety in the workplace | crash-barriers | security systems | safety gates | safety equipment for machines | door protection | professional protection items | multiwall sheets | fall-arrest systems
information: stommpy is a company of workplace safety, industrial safety guard and safety barrier experts. it designs, manufactures and installs impact safety barriers for industrial use that completely protect the infrastructures and safeguard the worker's health. stommpy has become an absolute industrial worldwide reference for all sectors regarding: food & beverage, pharmaceutical and hospital, automotive, mechanical, logistics & transport, large retail chains and distribution centres.

products_and_services: tile and tile floors, porcelain | porcelain tiles | ceramic tiles for floors | bathroom tiles | ceramic interior wall-coverings for industrial buildings
information: ceramiche san nicola s.r.l. is a family owned company based in south italy and manufacturing porcelain tiles. our products range from small formats to large ones, for indoor and outdoor flooring and wall covering. our new factory was opened in 2004 and in 2014 we have completely renovated our production line, acquiring the most advanced digital technology machinery allowing us to achieve, together with stringent quality controls, very high quality levels in terms of beauty, accuracy and durability. our whole production process is made in italy. as manufacturers, we are confident of offering high quality products to our customers at affordable prices, making our tiles a top choice in terms of value-for-money. after over 30 years of family experience in the field and after manufacturing porcelain tiles for over ten years for some important big names in the market and distributing our products in the domestic market, our company is now looking for distributors and possible partnerships in order to expand the presence of its brand on international markets. we are investing to improve brand awareness and planning a complete renovation of our website in order to improve usability and make product search easier. it will be soon available also in english. our company already achieved iso: 9000 certification a few years ago. we recently started the iso: 14000 certification process which will be completed later this year.
